items.sentence: Tom had something important to say, but Mary kept interrupting him.
I rode a motorcycle for three years before I started driving a car.
Tom forgot to ask Mary the question that John had asked him to ask.
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve heard Tom play his baritone sax.
Tom gave up his teaching job to become a full-time studio musician.
Tom decided not to play dodge ball because he wasn\'t feeling well.
Tom\'s impeccable manners made a big impression on Mary\'s parents.
I\'m pretty hungry since I haven\'t eaten since early this morning.
I suggest that we go to that new Chinese restaurant on Park Street.
I think that I may not be able to make myself understood in French.
